item.title: Links for Fri 2 Nov 2007
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Star Wars Crafts – Jabba the Puppet – If someone suggests that you are too much into Star Wars you can refute their claim by telling them you haven’t even started on a live sized Jabba the Hutt. Yet. Tags: starwars
item.content:encoded:
• Star Wars Crafts – Jabba the Puppet – If someone suggests that you are too much into Star Wars you can refute their claim by telling them you haven’t even started on a live sized Jabba the Hutt. Yet.
    Tags: starwars

item.title: The Two-Hour Star Wars Holiday Special in only Five Minutes
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: I only have a faint memory of watching the Star Wars Holiday Special back in 1978. That’s probably a good thing. Here’s the 5 minute version of the 2 hour special, but I’m warning you, this was worse that Jar Jar in the Phantom Menace:
item.content:encoded:
I only have a faint memory of watching the Star Wars Holiday Special back in 1978. That’s probably a good thing.

Here’s the 5 minute version of the 2 hour special, but I’m warning you, this was worse that Jar Jar in the Phantom Menace:

item.title: Star Wars In Ascii
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Hard to imagine that someone has taken the time to remake Star Wars in ascii. The quality is pretty good considering the limitations of the medium. Just telnet to towel.blinkenlights.nl and enjoy.
item.content:encoded:
Hard to imagine that someone has taken the time to remake Star Wars in ascii. The quality is pretty good considering the limitations of the medium.

Just telnet to towel.blinkenlights.nl and enjoy.

item.title: Napoleon Skywalker
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: It’s been two years and folks are still spoofing Napoleon Dynamite. I was sent a link to Napoleon Skywalker just the other day.
item.content:encoded: It’s been two years and folks are still spoofing Napoleon Dynamite. I was sent a link to Napoleon Skywalker just the other day.
